As someone who grinded this game on the PS4 back in 2017-2018, I had to get it once I got a PC. The game is fun at the start but once you start to get very good at the game, you will start to hate it. MMR honestly has ruined this game for me to the point where I only have fun if I dont take it seriously. Then again the game was at it's best when it first released and no one took it seriously. Now the devs are trying to make it into an esports title when it really isn't. The MMR has also made the tribalism in this community worse. Toxic killers trash survivors, and toxic survivors trash killers. I'd recommend this game to anyone that just wants to dick around and have fun. Otherwise I'd say a hard pass to anyone who's naturally competitive. It's just frustrating as hell when you take it seriously, and makes you want to stick your dong in a toaster.
very fun game
Good game

Shit devs who don't care, worse community than League and Rust combined. I want to invent a time machine to go back and make sure i don't spend any time or money on this game. 

If you do happen to fall for the cool licensed killers and actually try to play this game, just remember:
-- Playing survivor with friends is fun as you cyber bully and ruin the life of anyone else you play with/against (some of the time). 
-- Playing solo survivor is like peeling your cock with a rusty razor and drinking the blood. 
-- And playing killer like watching you life long enemy fuck your wife while you are being slowly tortured to death by a professional who knows the exact spots to cause as much pain as possible for as long as possible, and just as you think you'll die and get some relief you find out they have invented some sort of life giving potion that not only prolongs your life, it will grow back any extremities you lost form the torture (so they can take them away again) AND this potion also seems to make your senses more sensitive so that the pain only gets worse every second. And that just represents one game as killer.

강한 살인마하면 게임 재미없다고 욕하고

Super gra, bawi tak samo mając 10 godzin jak mając ich 200. Granie samemu nie jest wiele mniej przyjemne niż ze znajomymi, jak ma się dużą grupę można razem zagrać customa. Cała gra jest dobrze przemyślana, urozmaicona, czasem może lekko nie zbalansowana (granie killerem na team może być ciężkie) ale ogólnie daje dużo frajdy i nie nudzi się. Duża paleta killerów, jeszcze większa survivorów, wiele map i ciekawy pomysł na rozgrywkę na pewno oddadzą każdemu te parę złotych które gra jest wyceniona. Jedyny realny minus to to że jeśli nie chce się kupować dodatków trzeba sporo się nagrać aby odblokowywać postacie, aczkolwiek pykając regularnie ze znajomymi nie odczuwa się tego.

I have this game on console, decided to get it on PC, then barely play it for some reason. I just wanted to leave a review here and now because I wanted to say a few things. 

On console, I played this game for a long time. I really enjoyed playing as killer, specifically as Pig. But there were so many things taking away from the fun. 

1.) Toxic Players. This game is full of insecure players who like to put others down. It's a revolving cycle- toxic survivors breed toxic killers and vice versa. 

2.) Awful grind. Seriously, just terrible. 

3.) Boon Totems. This is the final (but obviously not only) reason why I quit. They take the unfun I have as killer and crank it up to maximum. 

4.) The Devs. I don't respect them. They keep the bar for this game so, so low. I mean, it took them 4 years to add colorblind settings, and they only did it after their public image was threatened. I do not respect them at all. 

5.) Large RNG. You can, as killer, get a map that favors you, or you can get a map that just completely sucks for whatever killer you're playing. 

There's other reasons, but I really can't think of them right now. Those are the main ones though. This game has an interesting concept. The lore is interesting too. Too bad it's all going down the drain.

XDM别玩，真的狗都不玩，外挂满天飞。这游戏圈内节奏比任何游戏都要多，各种定规矩，主播撕逼，赛后互骂。很多问题，明明官方下场，通过改变一些机制就能解决。比如说赛后聊天框，玩家之间友好交流的概率非常低，都在互相问候家人，明明可以像LOL一样直接删除。但人家就是不改，直接开摆。同时又对政治正确特别重视，什么歪风邪气，黑人主播被鞭尸立马就要删除巴布的所有面具，合着其他人就不是人了呗，不管面具是否解锁，统一赔偿一模一样的血点，肝面具花费的时间，在他们眼里不值一提。[spoiler]甚至到现在还有玩家赔偿的血点没有到账[/spoiler]
      这个游戏改档、外挂、卡BUG屡禁不止，加上这游戏在EPIC免费过，挂逼屯了一大批的账号，这游戏反外挂又如此的垃圾。导致外挂横行：360°打光灯、核弹闪光弹、闪电侠、一眼万年的爆柜、永不上勾的秒摇、二挂后的一键逃生、还有及其恶心的微调小人各种花样层出不穷。
       游戏制作组的决策人是个脑瘫，一心想着挣钱捞钱。《黎明杀机》这个IP爆火后，不好好经营这个游戏，拿着玩家的钱，跑去开发《死亡花园》结果这个游戏两年后都尼玛关停了。《死亡花园》凉了后才回来优化黎明杀机，结果优化了个啥，小削一刀人类，然后再大削一刀杀手，基本就是这么个套路。一堆历史遗留BUG不肯修复，拼了老命一样出新皮肤，完事还想要搞NTF数字版权，删除杀戮机制[spoiler]虽然最后没搞成[/spoiler]，加入SBMM机制，导致单排人类和屠夫体验及其差。恐怖游戏的本质已经变味了。
       在SBMM机制影响下，再加上这个游戏人屠本身就是对立的，单边人喜欢立规矩，赛后嘴臭，一些玩家都已经被PUA了，部分人直接化身为孝子，导致在游戏外能看到各种不统一的意见。【人类/屠夫】太强或太弱矛盾点直接转移到了玩家的头上，制作组完美甩锅。现在一挂死的巴布到处都是，这不是你自己种下的恶果？[spoiler]忘了你还得靠巴布赚屠夫的钱，不敢削捏[/spoiler]
       人家官方压根就不重视亚洲市场，还有人舔着脸给洋大人送钱，建个国区服务器都多久了？两年了！《黎明杀机》在国内都已经结束了，我Giao！我只能说好死，死快点，滚远点！
       最后给最后给不听劝要入坑的人，玩这游戏就不要冲着屠夫去玩。如果你是喜欢玩人类，而且经常开黑的话，你的体验会变得非常好，毕竟四个人恶心一个路人，体验怎么可能会不好捏？毕竟脸都不要了嘛！单排人就不要玩了，排队十分钟，树上挂到死！

本身就极度不推荐玩这个游戏，平衡做不好，一大堆下水道技能，还有下水道屠夫。如果你要说你看看别人玩的多好多怎么样，没有垃圾屠夫只有垃圾的玩家。拜托~~我就是臭打游戏的，又不是靠这个吃饭，好吗？再说自己摸着自己良心问你自己现在你玩到后面，那些下水道屠夫你能见到几次呀？而且现在屠夫体验极其糟糕，如果不打针对不去守一下尸，碰到会玩的必被4跑。然后还有就是那个及其非常特别“优秀”的匹配系统。你玩逃生者之前四跑是吧？下回给你换三个新手队友，治不了车队还治不了你？你玩屠夫是吧？看你被车队暴打连续四跑五六次啊？好好好，我制作组施舍给你4个不会玩的逃生者~[b]要记住是我们施舍给屠夫你的哟~[/b]搞得我个菜狗要不然被四跑，要不然下一把碰到萌新赢得一点意思都没有。缩短匹配时间也不能这么搞啊，硬平衡胜率是吧？
最后如果要是游戏里面小问题倒也不至于让我写小作文，主要是现在这游戏硬要站队， [spoiler]你妈妈的 [/spoiler]ban俄区，真的是脸都不要了。你还搞游戏制裁？之前搞NFT是吧？ 搞得抵制成啥样了？[spoiler]我真的是想吧ZZZ的妈杀了！ [/spoiler]

i feel the only reason this game is still alive is because it has no competition and it's the only game like this with horror icons. The game itself is painful to play most of the time. It's grind is disgustingly brutal and most times is pay to win. It's enjoyable when first starting out, as lower levels are not as toxic. But play too long and you'll suffer. As players play less for fun and more for the grind. Survivors have crutches and other perks that make it a breeze, especially ability to party up. That being said killers also have their fair share of crutches and overpowered perks/powers. If you really want this game, pleas buy it and have fun. I personally have grow a distaste to it over by 200+ hours. It can be fun in small bursts, but most times it leaves me feeling empty. Even if I "win" I gain no good feeling from it. It's always just "oh look blood web time". Until this game sees some kind of fixes, whether it be with maps, perks or something. I really don't recommend it unless playing as a SWIF (survive with friends) or one of your most favorite horror icons are in it. Even then you have to cough up $5-10 more.

The lore, premise and gameplay style is very interesting. However, this game has a steep learning curve. So as beginners you will expect to lose in the first several games (unless you are gifted in playing this game). 

I would only recommend this game only for players who are seeking a different and unique game, or wanting a challenge. Casual gamers or gamers that seek fun, enjoyment or laughs... I wouldn't recommend it. 

Highly recommend playing with friends, because playing solo might be a challenge.

I use nvidia filters to help my visibility as my monitor is super dark. I recommend playing at 120fps and using game filters from nvidia.
